name: Slime Baseball
description:
MADE IN 48 HOURS

Hit the ball at enemies to deal damage, the ball will always bounce back to you and the more your combo goes up, the faster it'll go and the more damage you'll do!

Pretty simple, I like the mechanic and think that this game is pretty satisfying to play, could've used some sort of wave system instead of just randomly spawning in enemies but whatever. 

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Swing Bat

R - Restart on death
